summary:
**Summary:**

"American Progress" by John Gast shows the U.S. leading civilization west, with settlers and new technologies. This idea, called "Manifest Destiny," believed Americans were meant to expand west. It led to wars and displacement of Indigenous Americans. The concept was controversial, with some supporting and others opposing it, especially due to slavery. Key events include the Mexicanâ€“American War and Texas Revolution.
title: Manifest destiny
